title: Arma: armed assault [RUSSIAN VERSION!!!!]
description:
The most committed and realistic fighting that have ever existed in video games. Ambitious project from the creators of Operation Flashpoint, went on a new engine, and moved in an era sverhsovremennyh military technologies. Infinite freedom of action and bribe naturalistichnostyu nature gave their lives neobyatny theater of war ...
Armed Assault - manifest proof of evolution in the genre of military simulators. About so grandiose scene of fighting earlier it was impossible dream. Freedom of movement for dvuhstah square kilometers of virtual space supported by an impressive number of units a wide range of military equipment. And interest in what is happening on the battlefield - high artificial intelligence computer opponents and realistic simulation of fighting.
